review:
Dr.Koteshwar was there since my daughter born. For every small reason I visit and take advice. His treatment is simple and very soon kid will recover. He has wide range of experience in different issue related to kids health. By just having a glance he can make it out what exactly the reason behind kids suffering, very good diagnosis. I have referred many parents to visit once, all parents are very happy and continue going for his treatment. In one statement, I just blindly believe his treatment.  I’m Aishi’s mother. Now my daughter is 5 yrs. I would have given feedback quite long back but it’s high time I should thank him by sharing my experiences. 
If any other related issue comes Dr.  will refer to specialist where I got really good diagnosis and treated well and soon. There are so many examples which I came across and treated well. Thank you so much doctor.  He was the pediatrician in delivery time when Aishi born. 

Regards
Aishi’s mom

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Growth & Development Evaluation / Management,Children's Health,Paediatric care,Diet advise for infants and toddlers,Consultation provided for newborns ,
review:
Dr. Rao is my go to doctor for my son, Reyansh, who is due to turn one this year! He accompanied my gynae in my labor room and has advised me from day 1. So, basis my continuous experience of the past 1 year, I feel I am qualified to provide a feedback. To us, he came across as a knowledgeable person who gives complete time and effort to assess a child. The best part is that he is easy to go and in limited words, expresses what is relevant and what is not. I have a lot of faith in his findings and follow his instructions in letter and spirit. Infact, even when I was traveling out of Hyderabad, he was accessible if I needed an advise.

Thanks for your services that you cater to the community, Mr. Rao. Trust me, people like us feel privileged to have you as a go-to doctor for their little ones :)

********* *** ****
He treated the child well
But waiting time was high
It took almost an hour to co.

The doctor was good in doing the routine check ups and giving basic consultation but during my babies vaccine, he was too rough while giving the same.
There was a lot of blood spill as all he did was just push the injection roughly.
Good and well experienced doctor with detailed explanation of the child growth. Provided valuable suggestions .
